question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. ice-cream sign
B. person in blue
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The person in the foreground holding the hot dog is much closer to the camera than the ice-cream sign in the background, making the depth relationship very obvious.
